attributes.action: Change the England flag on the new England football shirt back to red and white
attributes.additional_details: It makes a mockery of our English flag. Our English flag is red and white and why should a football shirt have a “playful update” as Nike call it in order to unite and inspire? What inspires people is seeing their red and white flag on the backs of their idols shirts when they win a football tournament.
attributes.background: Demand Nike to change the England flag on the new England shirt back to red and white instead of pink and blue.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the England football kit are a matter for the Football Association, not the UK Government or Parliament.
